text: Pseudobactricia ridleyi, also known as Ridley's Stick Insect, is an extinct stick insect of the family Diapheromeridae. The species was endemic to Singapore. ==References== Category:Insects described in 1904 Category:Phasmatodea Category:Endemic fauna of Singapore Category:Extinct insects since 1500 Category:Insects of Singapore
title: Pseudobactricia ridleyi
